Polisi Inggris Yakin 39 Mayat di Truk Pendingin Warga Vietnam
02 Nov 2019, 06:45 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi. (Istockphoto/Nito100)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pihak kepolisian Inggris menyatakan 39 jenazah yang ditemukan di dalam sebuah truk di Inggris bulan lalu merupakan warga negara Vietnam. Dalam sebuah pernyataan yang mereka sampaikan Jumat (1/11), mereka menyatakan telah menghubungi pemerintah Vietnam terkait kesimpulan tersebut. "Pada saat ini, kami percaya para korban adalah warga negara Vietnam, dan kami berhubungan dengan Pemerintah Vietnam," kata Asisten Kepala Polisi Tim Smith seperti dikutip dari CNN.com, Sabtu (2/11).Sebanyak 39 jenazah ditemukan di belakang truk berpendingin di sebuah taman industri Inggris di Grays, Essex, 20 mil sebelah timur London pada akhir bulan lalu. Polisi Inggris awalnya menduga jenazah tersebut merupakan warga negara China.Kesimpulan berubah setelah mereka mendapatkan laporan tentang orang yang hilang di masyarakat Vietnam.Kedutaan Besar Vietnam di London mengatakan sangat sedih atas temuan awal polisi. Mereka mengirimkan ucapan belasungkawa kepada keluarga para korbanKedutaan menambahkan bahwa mereka akan berkoordinasi dengan otoritas terkait Vietnam dan Inggris untuk mendukung keluarga para korban jika mereka ingin membawa keluarga pulang ke Vietnam.(CNN.com/agt)

British police believe 39 bodies in Vietnamese refrigeration trucks
02 Nov 2019, 06:45 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration. (Istockphoto / Nito100)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - British police said 39 bodies found in a truck in Britain last month were Vietnamese citizens. In a statement they delivered Friday (1/11), they stated that they had contacted the Vietnamese government regarding this conclusion. "At this time, we believe the victims are Vietnamese citizens, and we are in contact with the Vietnamese Government," Assistant Police Chief Tim Smith was quoted as saying on CNN.com, Saturday (2/11). A total of 39 bodies were found behind refrigerated trucks in a British industrial park in Grays, Essex, 20 miles east of London at the end of last month. British police initially suspected the body of being a Chinese citizen. The conclusion changed after they got a report about a missing person in Vietnamese society. The Vietnamese Embassy in London said it was very sad over the initial findings of the police. They sent their condolences to the families of the victims. The embassy added that they would coordinate with relevant authorities in Vietnam and Britain to support the families of the victims if they wanted to bring the families back to Vietnam. (CNN.com/agt)
